resources.item: SELECT creationDate, valueData FROM DATA_SENSOR WHERE numSensor = ? AND numIPSO = ?
SELECT creationDate, valueData FROM DATA_SENSOR WHERE numSensor = ? AND numIPSO = ? AND creationDate <= ? AND creationDate >= ?
SELECT numIPSO FROM TYPE_IPSO NATURAL JOIN DATA_SENSOR GROUP BY numIPSO HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
SELECT numSensor FROM SENSOR NATURAL JOIN DATA_SENSOR GROUP BY numSensor HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
SELECT numIPSO FROM TYPE_IPSO NATURAL JOIN DATA_SENSOR WHERE numSensor = ? GROUP BY numIPSO HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
SELECT numSensor FROM SENSOR NATURAL JOIN DATA_SENSOR WHERE numIPSO = ? GROUP BY numSensor HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
